name: The Harvester
description:
Don't click "Run game" on here !!! The game works better on Netlify: https://theharvester.netlify.com/

Theme: Harvest
Limitation: Only One => only one level

Game made on construct.net (3/20/20 - 3/26/20)

Sound effects from zapsplat.com
Music made on beepbox.co
